work_habits.meeting_preferences: Keeps meetings short (<45 min); prefers agenda‑driven stand‑ups and bi‑weekly sprint reviews; avoids unnecessary all‑hands.
work_habits.work_environment: Hybrid (2‑3 days in office, rest remote)

personality.decision_making_approach: Data‑driven but willing to act on gut when timelines are tight
personality.risk_tolerance: Moderate – comfortable with incremental innovation, cautious on large‑scale bets
personality.collaboration_style: Assertive facilitator; encourages input but drives consensus quickly
personality.stress_management_approach: Morning workout, Pomodoro technique, and scheduled ‘quiet hours’
personality.conflict_resolution_style: Direct with focus on solutions; uses structured de‑briefs to keep tone constructive

availability.travel_flexibility: Moderate (up to 5 trips/year, each up to 5 days)

personal_factors.commute_situation: Hybrid: 30‑minute drive to office on office days
personal_factors.health_considerations: Mild lower‑back issue; uses standing desk and stretches regularly
personal_factors.career_motivation: Aim to lead a full product line, shape user experience at scale, and build a reputation as a cross‑functional leader

collaboration.meeting_frequency_preference: Weekly stand‑up, bi‑weekly sprint planning, ad‑hoc as needed; caps longer meetings at 1 h
collaboration.feedback_style: Direct but diplomatic; prefers data‑backed points
collaboration.knowledge_sharing_habits: Writes concise post‑mortems, hosts monthly brown‑bag sessions, maintains a shared best‑practice repo

potential_bottlenecks: Dependency on external data engineering team for analytics
risk_factors.backup_person_needed: Associate PM Emily Chen for day‑to‑day task ownership during absences
burnout_risk_factors: High meeting load during release weeks
Balancing family duties with occasional overtime
